content:
Subject: Top Position - Dominate Your Local Market with SEO and Google Ads

Hey [Prospect's Name],

[Your Name] here from Top Position. Ready to crush your competition and own your local market with powerful SEO and Google Ads, even if you think you have enough business?

(Allow them to respond.)

Common Objections and Responses:

1. Objection: "I'm too busy."
Response: I completely understand, and I value your time. That's why we're here to take the load off your shoulders and handle your online marketing, so you can focus on running your business. Our 15-minute call will set the foundation for driving more business without adding to your workload.
2. Objection: "We already have enough business."
Response: It's great to hear that your business is thriving! However, the market is constantly changing, and it's essential to stay ahead of the competition. By optimizing your SEO and Google Ads, you'll ensure long-term stability and continued growth, securing your business's future success.
3. Objection: "We've tried online marketing before, and it didn't work."
Response: I understand that previous experiences can be discouraging, but at Top Position, we have a proven track record of success. Our tailored strategies for businesses like yours have delivered real, tangible results. Let's discuss how our unique approach can help you achieve your business goals.
4. Objection: "I don't understand SEO and Google Ads."
Response: No problem! That's what we're here for. Our team of experts will guide you through the process and handle everything, from strategy to implementation. We're here to help you succeed and make sure you're informed every step of the way.
5. Objection: "It's too expensive."
Response: Investing in SEO and Google Ads is an investment in your business's future growth. Our services are designed to provide a strong return on investment, driving more leads and conversions while increasing your overall revenue. We'll work with you to create a tailored plan that fits your budget and delivers results.

If they're interested in learning more:

Great! Let's discuss our services in detail. I have two time slots for a 15-minute call tomorrow: [Proposed Time A] and [Proposed Time B]. Which one works for you?

(If they say no or not interested:)

No worries. Remember, when you're ready to dominate, we'll be here. Have an amazing day!

(End the call)

Personalize the script by researching the prospect's business before the call and adjust your approach based on their responses.
